title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Design and Operational Practice of Public Institution Performance Measurement Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of public institution administrative tasks and foundational data analysis
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Explain the purpose and operational process of performance measurement in public institutions
Design three or more performance indicators (KPIs) tailored to organizational characteristics
Propose improvements to performance measurement systems through stakeholder consultations
Write a report on organizational learning strategies utilizing performance data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
